summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3941 for the improvement of 22nd Avenue from East Cherry Street to East Olive Street and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48011 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
